subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN3188 is on the way
description_text:

Just wondering if you could please advise when this item will ship?
Tracking says the item has not been shipped yet.

Scott

conversations.body_text: Hi Scotty Beard,    We apologize for the inconvenience caused. We expect to complete restocking and shipping by next Monday.

Hi

Just following up on this. Can you please advise when the item will be
shipped?

Thanks
Scotty


On Wed, 12 Nov 2025, 5:57 pm service@simsonn.com,
Hi Scotty Beard,    We apologize for the delay. Here is your shipping tracking link.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047023890884

Hi

This item has been in Sydney for more than a week, however, there have been
no further movements.

Can you please follow up with the carrier?

Thanks
Scott

On Fri, 21 Nov 2025, 10:06 pm service@simsonn.com,
